description: Maximal run length in base 16 representation of n.
prog: (PARI) A043290(n,b=16)={my(m,c=1);while(n>0,n%b==(n\=b)%b && c++ && next;m=max(m,c);c=1);m} \\ Use optional 2nd arg to get sequences A043276 through A043289. - _M. F. Hasler_, Jul 23 2013
crossrefs: Cf. A043276-A043289 for base-2 to base-15 analogs.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
